channel.title: Wave table crash
channel.description: I am trying to play two wave files with computer free mode (I have upload the patch to the board as startup), but the board got disconnected within one minute and I have this message: Control transfer failed: -9 Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now my firmware is 1.0.0.1table player.axp (9.1 KB) is it because I put the wav file in the wrong place? or the files are too big? they are around 30 mbs. many thanks.

item.title: Wave table crash
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Is the patch by any chance polyphonic?

Can tables be used in subpatches in polyphonic mode?

Hmm even with the default tablet/read interp i get a crash when going live with my patch. In mono it works fine - I have to push a button to load the .wav file into the table. In poly, it just flies off after going live. Control transfer failed: -9 Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Disconnect request Perhaps I have to use an init script for the table alloc object? *what.. looks like my wavetable experiment stopped working also.. ***OK so it looks like it crashes when it receives aâ€¦

There are also some more info on the control 9 error here:
http://community.axoloti.com/search?q=Control%20transfer%20failed%3A%20-9

Read full topic

item.title: Wave table crash
item.dc:creator: @shihweichieh
item.description:
@shihweichieh wrote:

I am trying to play two wave files with computer free mode (I have upload the patch to the board as startup), but the board got disconnected within one minute and I have this message:

Control transfer failed: -9
Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now

my firmware is 1.0.0.1table player.axp (9.1 KB)

is it because I put the wav file in the wrong place? or the files are too big? they are around 30 mbs.

many thanks.

Read full topic
